articles.title: Trudeau caps Europe trip with more sanctions against Russian oligarchs - CTV News
articles.description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau capped a weeklong European trip by slapping new sanctions on Roman Abramovich and four other Russia oligarchs.
articles.content:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau capped a weeklong European trip by slapping new sanctions on Roman Abramovich and four other Russia oligarchs.
